description.en: Universal control for white-label Tuya Zigbee devices - no cloud, full local integration
description.fr: Contrôle universel pour appareils Tuya Zigbee - sans cloud, intégration locale complète

hint.en: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting device issues
Receive notifications about new device support from community
How often the device reports values (60-3600 seconds)
hint.fr: Fréquence des rapports de valeurs (60-3600 secondes)

hint.en: Calibrate temperature readings (-10 to +10°C)
hint.fr: Calibrer les lectures de température (-10 à +10°C)

hint.en: Calibrate humidity readings (-20 to +20%)
Time to wait before clearing motion alarm
hint.fr: Délai avant effacement de l'alarme mouvement

Press any button 3 times rapidly
Press and hold the button for 5 seconds until LED flashes
Press and hold the button for 5 seconds until LED flashes
Press and hold setup button for 3 seconds
Follow the pairing instructions for your Doorbell.
Follow the pairing instructions for your Door Lock.

Press and hold the button on the device for 5 seconds to pair
instruction.fr: Appuyez et maintenez le bouton pendant 5 secondes pour appairer

instruction.en: Press and hold the pairing button for 5 seconds until LED blinks rapidly.

name.en: Motion Temp Humidity Illumination Multi Battery

instruction.en: Press the pairing button until LED blinks rapidly
Follow the pairing instructions for your Outdoor Siren.
Follow the pairing instructions for your Pet Feeder.
Press the pairing button until LED blinks rapidly

Press and hold the pairing button until the LED blinks
Press and hold the button for 5 seconds until LED flashes
Press and hold the button for 5 seconds until LED flashes

Press and hold the button for 5 seconds until LED flashes

name.en: Advanced Smoke Detector with Temperature & Humidity

instruction.en: Press and hold the pairing button until the LED blinks
Follow the pairing instructions for your Temperature Sensor.
Press and hold the pairing button for 3 seconds
Press and hold the pairing button for 5 seconds

Follow the pairing instructions for your Mini Switch.
Turn the switch on/off 3 times quickly

Press and hold pairing button for 5 seconds until LED blinks rapidly
Follow the pairing instructions for your Remote Switch.
Follow the pairing instructions for your Wireless Switch.
